subtitle: This is a very easy recipe if you use canned black-eyed beans. Serve as an accompaniment to meat or fish - or cold as a salad.

method.text: In a large bowl of cold water, soak the beans overnight.
Rinse thoroughly and drain well. Transfer to a saucepan and pour in enough cold water to cover.
Add the onion and bring to the boil. Cook for 30-40 min or until tender. Drain well.
Meanwhile, cook the rice in plenty of boiling water for 10-15 min or until tender. Drain well.
In a clean pan, mix together the cooked and drained beans and rice, raisins, parsley and seasoning to taste. Heat through for a further 1-2 min to warm through.

title: Black-eyed beans and rice
